mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ARTIST_REPLY (REPLY_NUMBER, USER_NUMBER, ARTIST_NUMBER, REPLY_CONTENT) VALUES (SEQ_USER_ARTIST_REPLY_NUMBER.NEXTVAL, #{userNumber}, #{artistNumber}, #{replyContent})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(REPLY_NUMBER) FROM TBL_ARTIST_REPLY /*집계함수는 결과가 한 개 나옴*/ WHERE ARTIST_NUMBER = #{artistNumber}
